text: Periestola strandi is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae, and the only species in the genus Periestola. It was described by Breuning in 1943.Biolib.cz - Periestola strandi. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Desmiphorini Category:Beetles described in 1943 Category:Monotypic beetle genera
title: Periestola
